Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: We use IP addresses to analyze trends, administer the site, track user's movement, and gather broad demographic information for aggregate use. IP addresses are not linked to personally identifiable information.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: This website takes every precaution to protect our users' information. When users submit sensitive information via the website, your information is protected both online and off-line. This security is enhanced by our use of firewalls protecting all of the ListMatch servers. We also do everything in our power to protect user-information off-line. All of our users' information is restricted in our offices. Only employees who need the information to perform a specific job (for example, our customer service representative) are granted access to personally identifiable information. The physical servers that we store personally identifiable information on are kept in a secure collocation facility, within locked cages that only network administrators have access to. This facility provides security 24 hours a day, 365 days a year and guaranties our servers against power outages by using automated backup power systems. Credit card information that is collected on our sign-up page is done via a SSL certificate and the information is not sold or shared. If you have any questions about the security at our website, you can send an email to our contact form\n\n
Label: Others

Text: You will receive administrative emails that are related to the primary usage of our service. You may not opt-out of administrative emails. These administrative emails will not have any marketing, promotional or advertising material(s) in them.\n\n
Label: Others

Text: If a user's personally identifiable information changes (such as your zip code), or if a user no longer desires our service, we will endeavor to provide a way to correct, update that user's personal data provided to us.
Label: Description of Right to Correct Information

Text: This can be done by calling our toll-free telephone number at or by emailing our Customer Support at our contact form.

Log Files

We use IP addresses to analyze trends, administer the site, track user's movement, and gather broad demographic information for aggregate use. IP addresses are not linked to personally identifiable information.

Text:
Correction/Updating Personal Information

If a user's personally identifiable information changes (such as your zip code), or if a user no longer desires our service, we will endeavor to provide a way to correct, update that user's personal data provided to us. This can be done by calling our toll-free telephone number at or by emailing our Customer Support at our contact form.
Label: Description of Right to Correct Information

Text:
Legal Disclaimer

Though we make every effort to preserve your privacy we may need to disclose personal information when required by law or in the good-faith belief that such action is necessary in order to conform to the edicts of the law or comply with a legal process served on our Web site.
